content.text:
In a kitchen design, what should be included on one side of the sink, with a width of at least 24 inches, and on the other side, with a width of at least 18 inches?<image 1>

A. Dish rack
B. Dishwasher
C. Cutting board
D. Countertop landing area

The correct answer is D. Countertop landing area. A countertop landing area is typically placed on one side of the sink to provide a space for placing items such as dishes, utensils, or cleaning supplies. It is important to have a width of at least 24 inches to accommodate these items comfortably.
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
